biography:
Chad I Ginsburg (born April 24, 1972), also credited as CiG, is an American heavy metal musician and record producer. He is best known as the guitarists and vocalist of West Chester-based band CKY, which he co-founded in 1998. 

Description above from the Wikipedia article Chad I Ginsburg, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Chad I Ginsburg
